verses.verse: And afterward <WH310> Mosheh <WH4872> and Aharon <WH175> went in <WH935> <WH8804>, and told <WH559> <WH8799> Pharaoh <WH6547>, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, Let my people <WH5971> go <WH7971> <WH8761>, that they may hold a feast <WH2287> <WH8799> unto me in the wilderness <WH4057>.

And Pharaoh <WH6547> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Who is the YY <WH3068>, that I should obey <WH8085> <WH8799> his voice <WH6963> to let Yisra'EL <WH3478> go <WH7971> <WH8763>? I know <WH3045> <WH8804> not the YY <WH3068>, neither will I let Yisra'EL <WH3478> go <WH7971> <WH8762>.

And they said <WH559> <WH8799>, The 'Elohim <WH430> of the Hebrews <WH5680> hath met <WH7122> <WH8738> with us: let us go <WH3212> <WH8799>, we pray thee, three <WH7969> days <WH3117> ' journey <WH1870> into the desert <WH4057>, and sacrifice <WH2076> <WH8799> unto the YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430>; lest he fall <WH6293> <WH8799> upon us with pestilence <WH1698>, or with the sword <WH2719>.

And the king <WH4428> of Egypt <WH4714> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, Wherefore do ye, Mosheh <WH4872> and Aharon <WH175>, let <WH6544> <WH8686> the people <WH5971> from their works <WH4639>? get <WH3212> <WH8798> you unto your burdens <WH5450>.
And Pharaoh <WH6547> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Behold, the people <WH5971> of the land <WH776> now are many <WH7227>, and ye make them rest <WH7673> <WH8689> from their burdens <WH5450>.
And Pharaoh <WH6547> commanded <WH6680> <WH8762> the same day <WH3117> the taskmasters <WH5065> <WH8802> of the people <WH5971>, and their officers <WH7860> <WH8802>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Ye shall no more <WH3254> <WH8686> give <WH5414> <WH8800> the people <WH5971> straw <WH8401> to make <WH3835> <WH8800> brick <WH3843>, as heretofore <WH8032> <WH8543>: let them go <WH3212> <WH8799> and gather <WH7197> <WH8782> straw <WH8401> for themselves.

And the tale <WH4971> of the bricks <WH3843>, which they did make <WH6213> <WH8802> heretofore <WH8032> <WH8543>, ye shall lay <WH7760> <WH8799> upon them; ye shall not diminish <WH1639> <WH8799> ought thereof: for they be idle <WH7503> <WH8737>; therefore they cry <WH6817> <WH8802>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Let us go <WH3212> <WH8799> and sacrifice <WH2076> <WH8799> to our 'Elohim <WH430>.
Let there more work <WH5656> be laid <WH3513> <WH8799> upon the men <WH582>, that they may labour <WH6213> <WH8799> therein; and let them not regard <WH8159> <WH8799> vain <WH8267> words <WH1697>.

And the taskmasters <WH5065> <WH8802> of the people <WH5971> went out <WH3318> <WH8799>, and their officers <WH7860> <WH8802>, and they spake <WH559> <WH8799> to the people <WH5971>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> Pharaoh <WH6547>, I will not give <WH5414> <WH8802> you straw <WH8401>.

Go <WH3212> <WH8798> ye, get <WH3947> <WH8798> you straw <WH8401> where <WH834> ye can find <WH4672> <WH8799> it: yet <WH3588> not ought <WH1697> of your work <WH5656> shall be diminished <WH1639> <WH8737>.
So the people <WH5971> were scattered abroad <WH6327> <WH8686> throughout all the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> to gather <WH7197> <WH8780> stubble <WH7179> instead of straw <WH8401>.

And the taskmasters <WH5065> <WH8802> hasted <WH213> <WH8801> them, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Fulfil <WH3615> <WH8761> your works <WH4639>, your daily <WH3117> tasks <WH1697>, as when there was <WH1961> <WH8800> straw <WH8401>.

And the officers <WH7860> <WH8802> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, which Pharaoh's <WH6547> taskmasters <WH5065> <WH8802> had set <WH7760> <WH8804> over them, were beaten <WH5221> <WH8714>, and demanded <WH559> <WH8800>, Wherefore have ye not fulfilled <WH3615> <WH8765> your task <WH2706> in making brick <WH3835> <WH8800> both yesterday <WH8543> and to day <WH3117>, as heretofore <WH8032> <WH8543> ?

Then the officers <WH7860> <WH8802> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> came <WH935> <WH8799> and cried <WH6817> <WH8799> unto Pharaoh <WH6547>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Wherefore dealest <WH6213> <WH8799> thou thus with thy servants <WH5650> ?

There is no straw <WH8401> given <WH5414> <WH8737> unto thy servants <WH5650>, and they say <WH559> <WH8802> to us, Make <WH6213> <WH8798> brick <WH3843>: and, behold, thy servants <WH5650> are beaten <WH5221> <WH8716>; but the fault <WH2398> <WH8804> is in thine own people <WH5971>.

But he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Ye are idle <WH7503> <WH8737>, ye are idle <WH7503> <WH8737>: therefore ye say <WH559> <WH8802>, Let us go <WH3212> <WH8799> and do sacrifice <WH2076> <WH8799> to the YY <WH3068>.

Go <WH3212> <WH8798> therefore now, and work <WH5647> <WH8798>; for there shall no straw <WH8401> be given <WH5414> <WH8735> you, yet shall ye deliver <WH5414> <WH8799> the tale <WH8506> of bricks <WH3843>.

And the officers <WH7860> <WH8802> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> did see <WH7200> <WH8799> that they were in evil <WH7451> case, after it was said <WH559> <WH8800>, Ye shall not minish <WH1639> <WH8799> ought from your bricks <WH3843> of your daily <WH3117> <WH3117> task <WH1697>.
And they met <WH6293> <WH8799> Mosheh <WH4872> and Aharon <WH175>, who stood <WH5324> <WH8737> in the way <WH7125> <WH8800>, as they came forth <WH3318> <WH8800> from Pharaoh <WH6547>:

And they said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, The YY <WH3068> look <WH7200> <WH8799> upon you, and judge <WH8199> <WH8799>; because ye have made our savour <WH7381> to be abhorred <WH887> <WH8689> in the eyes <WH5869> of Pharaoh <WH6547>, and in the eyes <WH5869> of his servants <WH5650>, to put <WH5414> <WH8800> a sword <WH2719> in their hand <WH3027> to slay <WH2026> <WH8800> us.

And Mosheh <WH4872> returned <WH7725> <WH8799> unto the YY <WH3068>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, YY <WH136>, wherefore hast thou so evil entreated <WH7489> <WH8689> this people <WH5971>? why is it that thou hast sent <WH7971> <WH8804> me?

For since I came <WH935> <WH8804> to Pharaoh <WH6547> to speak <WH1696> <WH8763> in thy name <WH8034>, he hath done evil <WH7489> <WH8689> to this people <WH5971>; neither hast thou delivered <WH5337> <WH8689> thy people <WH5971> at all <WH5337> <WH8687>.
